description: This file contains CSS styles including theme management variables for light and dark themes, styling for the App component, and responsive design adjustments.

classes.name: .App
classes.description: Main styling for the primary application container, including text alignment and background color management.

classes.name: .App-logo
classes.description: Styling for the application logo, including size and interaction properties.

classes.name: .App-header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the application, including layout and background colors.

classes.name: .App-link
classes.description: Styling for hyperlinks within the application, including color transitions.

classes.name: .theme-toggle
classes.description: Styling for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
